summary: Secret hidden Dwemer city of Volengaar
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i263.photobucket.com/albums/ii131/hayleyeldiablo/vcreations1.png[/IMG]

==============================================
ABOUT THIS MOD:
==============================================
Welcome to the City of Volengaar mod. An vast new underground dwemer city much like that of Blackreach, but instead uninhabited by the nasty falmer and redesigned as a beautiful haven.

Explore through the new area and hang up your boots in your cozy new player home.

I hope you enjoy this mod, if so please endorse.

==============================================
REQUIREMENTS:
==============================================


==============================================
SUMMARY:
===============================================


===============================================
INSTALLATION:
===============================================
Extract all .esp and .esm files to the Data Files directory.
Extract all .nif Files to the Data Files\\Meshes directory.


===============================================
PLAYING THIS PLUGIN:
===============================================


===============================================
KNOWN ISSUES OR BUGS:
===============================================


===============================================
VERSION HISTORY
===============================================


===============================================
INCOMPATIBILITIES & SAVED GAME WARNINGS:
===============================================
Always make sure that you backup your existing savegame before use.


===============================================
CREDITS & USAGE:
